title: Looking for a web, mobile developer with experience in ODK aggregate installation/ ODK Collect, Linux, MySQL, PHP, Tomcat, android app design to install KoboToolbox on a personal hosted server.
snippet:
Looking for a web, mobile developer with experience in ODK aggregate installation/ ODK Collect, Linux, MySQL, PHP, Tomcat, android app design.

Project requirements:

1)	Install Kobotoolbox on a hosted
https://github.com/kobotoolbox/
http://support.kobotoolbox.org/customer/en/portal/articles/1691108-install-kobotoolbox-on-your-own-servers
http://support.kobotoolbox.org/customer/portal/articles/1691108-install-kobotoolbox-on-your-own-servers
a.	Make sure that all features work and are bugs free.
(create forms using webform, upload xls forms, preview forms with enketo etc..)
b.	Remove Logo from top of pages. Credit will be provided at the bottom somewhere
c.	Remove Logo from enketo forms

2)	Customize ODK Collect android app
https://opendatakit.org/downloads/

https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.odk.collect.android

To be similar to this one –
https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.earlysail.odkclient&hl=en

I will provide company logo and domain name -

Bonus will be paid for:
Suggesting and Integrating any other features not included in the package – I will pay for each addition if I like it.

Project restrictions:

Developer must agree to sign an NDA  -
All project codes will be returned to company
